# Wiki: Business Knowledge

This directory contains business domain knowledge for the project.

## Purpose
Store business rules, domain concepts, and stakeholder requirements that help AI understand the "why" behind features.

## Example Contents
- Business rules and constraints
- Domain terminology glossary
- Stakeholder requirements
- User personas

## Template

```markdown
# [Domain Concept Name]

## Definition
[What this concept means in the business context]

## Business Rules
- Rule 1
- Rule 2

## Examples
[Concrete examples]

## Related Concepts
- [Link to related concept]
```
